error_alert_text: Something went wrong! Please try again.
token_expired_alert_text: Please log in again to continue.
name: Name
search_book: Search for a book to add
settings_beSafe: Always try to be safe when meeting people online.
verify_email_address: We sent you an email with an the verification link.
signin-description: Sign in, using your preferred method, or quickly create an account.
register_description: Join the community by using one of the method below.
welcomeSearch-paragraph: Find books from a place near you in few clicks, and its totally free!
welcomeHow-subtitle: Finding a book to borrow has never been easier.
welcomeHow-step1: Search for a specific book, or just browse available books near you
welcomeHow-step2: Select a book from the list of available titles near you
welcomeHow-step3: Choose a date and time that suits you and send your request
welcomeHow-step4: Pick up your book, after receiving confirmation of your request
welcomeAdd-subheading: Give away or sell your books
welcomeAdd-paragraph: Be part of the community and quickly add your books to our selection to give them a second life. Create an account and quickly add a book by simply using it's title
welcomeHowAdd-subtitle: Be part of the community and quickly add your books to our selection to give them a second life. Just follow these 4 steps.
welcomeHowAdd-step1: Search your books using a title or author
welcomeHowAdd-step2: Select the current location of the book
welcomeHowAdd-step3: Choose the condition of the book
welcomeHowAdd-step4: Decide if loaning it or give it away
welcomeJoin-paragraph: Stay up to speed, with BooksBank News, features announcement, and carefully selected offers.
welcomeAbout-paragraph1: Booksbank is a community driven project, aimed at allowing everyone to be able to enjoy a nice read, by borrowing books that would otherwise sit on a shelf collecting dust.
welcomeAbout-paragraph2: The heart of booksbank it's YOU! This project would not be possible if it wasn't for the thousands of community members who are happy to lend their books.
bookshelfAdd-paragraph: Be part of the community and quickly add your books to our selection to give them a second life. Adding a book is very simple and just takes 4 simple steps:
bookshelfAdd-paragraph2: Get started now by completing the form below, or watch the following video for more information:
bookshelfAdd-steps-step1-description: Search out database with millions of books available
bookshelfAdd-steps-step2-description: Provide some quick details for users to know
bookshelfAdd-step2-description: Select the condition that best describe our book
bookshelfAdd-step3-title: 4. What do you want to do with your book
bookshelfAdd-how-to-step1: Setup the location of your book (just on the first book)
bookshelfAdd-how-to-step2: Search your book by its title and/or author
bookshelfAdd-how-to-step3: Select the condition that best describe our book
bookshelfAdd-how-to-step4: Select what do you want to do with your book
bookshelfAddNoBookshelfBanner-paragraph:
You need to set a location for your books!
See the following video for info or just click the button below to get started! It is super easy!
bookshelfSettings-timeslot-title: Choose your preferred time for the book to be picked up
libraryBorrow-noBooks: Please help the community by adding your own books! It is very easy, you just need an account and a title.
libraryBorrow-noBooks-heading: No Books found in this area!
libraryBorrow-searchOtherBooks: Other books available within your radius
libraryBorrow-timeslot-title: Available times to pick up. Please select at least 3 slots before continuing
sFooter-text: Finding a book to borrow has never been easier. Join our community members and start to read now from the comfort of your home.
